creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Wesley Clark
description: twenty two lines, first line indented slightly from R; last line is broken in two; last three lines from L are indented from the top; mounted on larger, similarly colored sheet
markings: on back, URC, in pencil: [Akiyama Gyokuzan]; on back, top corner, near R, in pencil, in Japanese
title: Letter
